meanings.definition: The state or quality of being compatible.
meanings.sent1: The compatiblenesses between the two friends made their relationship strong.
meanings.sent2: The compatiblenesses of their personalities allowed them to get along well.
meanings.sent3: Their compatiblenesses in taste for ice cream led to many fun outings.
meanings.sent4: The compatiblenesses in their interests created a harmonious bond between them.
meanings.sent5: The compatiblenesses in their values made them great partners in their business venture.

meanings.definition: The degree to which two or more things are able to exist or work together without conflict.
meanings.sent1: The compatiblenesses of the puzzle pieces made it easy to complete the picture.
meanings.sent2: The compatiblenesses of their schedules allowed them to plan the event smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The compatiblenesses of their opinions on the movie made for a lively discussion.
meanings.sent4: The compatiblenesses of the ingredients in the recipe resulted in a delicious dish.
meanings.sent5: The compatiblenesses of their goals aligned perfectly, leading to a successful project.

meanings.definition: The ability of a computer or software to work with other systems or programs.
meanings.sent1: The compatiblenesses of the new software with existing programs saved time for the team.
meanings.sent2: The compatiblenesses of the operating systems allowed for seamless integration.
meanings.sent3: The compatiblenesses of the coding languages made the project development efficient.
meanings.sent4: The compatiblenesses of the devices ensured smooth data transfer.
meanings.sent5: The compatiblenesses of the applications improved overall productivity in the office.
